step.cmd: Select the cell whose data you want to replace.
Select rows to if you want the data replacement to apply to specific rows only.
step.info: If you do not select any rows, Ormetis Professional Edition replaces the data in all cells whose values correspond to the value you selected.

step.cmd: Click DataSort & FilterReplace All and type the replacement text in the cell.

example.title: Replacing text in cells
example.p: In the following view you select rows 1 and 2 and replace the "Jacket" text in the Product column with "Coat".
Ormetis Professional Edition replaces the data as follows:

In the same view, you replace the "Jacket" text with "Coat" in any cell in the Product column, and without selecting any rows. In this case, Ormetis Professional Edition changes the values in all the cells to "Coat".
